title: B1A4’s Baro Perfectly Portrays A Blind Man In Stills For Upcoming Web Movie | Soompi
text:
Pin Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
B1A4’s Baro makes the perfect transformation into a blind man for his upcoming web movie “Closed Eyes” (literal translation). 
On February 20, main director Kim Sol Mae expressed, “When I saw Baro’s crying scene, I got the impression that he is now a real actor, not an idol-turned-actor. The way he discusses the script with the staff and expresses his opinions is very respectful and earnest, and he completely understands the screenwriter’s intentions.” 
“Everyone had a hard time shooting in the cold and pulling all-nighters, but Baro didn’t show any signs of how tired he was. Instead, he livened up the mood by always responding to the producer’s requests with a smile, no matter how difficult they were,” he continued. 
“Closed Eyes” is an action thriller web movie about a blind man (Baro) who attempts to dig up the truth behind a serial killing incident. It will premiere in March through various online platforms. 
Meanwhile, Baro made his acting debut through “Reply 1994” and appeared in dramas like “ Master: God of Noodles ,” Angry Mom ,” and “ God’s Gift – 14 Days .” 
Are you looking forward to Baro’s new movie?
